sentences.sContent: His speech laid the groundwork for independence.
sentences.sCn: 他的演说为独立打下了基础。

sentences.sContent: Much of the groundwork has already been done .
sentences.sCn: 准备工作已经完成了很多。

words.tran: [电] 接地；基础；搁浅；（染色的）底色

trans.tranOther: something that has to happen before an activity or plan can be successful
